content:
I have  5+ year full time  experience as angular/ .net  developer. My link in profile can be found https://www.linkedin.com/in/lingjie-zhou-2b253028/

    Currently, I am very interested in angular  development and building an angular6 JsonFormBuilder project and  hosted in firebase as 
    https: //jsonbasedspa.firebaseapp.com/ 
    
    Main feature page is Form builder which allows you build and review your own form dynamically.  I am current working on json based form validation and workflow 
    
    The Home page contains some examples. 
    
    This project used Reactive Form, Observable, Ngrx etc. technology and it hosted in firebase. you can try out your own idea
